item.title: European Stocks Tread Water as Inditex Gains Fail to Lift Mood
item.description: European markets were mixed on Wednesday as investors awaited the outcome of the European Central Bank’s (ECB) policy meeting. The Stoxx Europe 600 index was down 0.1% at 417.95 points by 0815 GMT. Inditex shares rose 2.9% after the company reported a 16% rise in first-half profit.
